name: Solar Steel
description:
(Multiplayer only)

Cosmic 2-player sword duels! 

Controls:  P1
  • move/change stance: I/J/K/L
  • attack: Z
  • parry: X
  • super attack: Z+X
P2
  • move/change stance: Arrow Keys
  • attack: Shift
  • parry: Ctrl
  • super attack: Z+X
Instructions:
  • Move to switch between left/right stances
  • Tap ATTACK to start a swing
  • Hold ATTACK to perform a thrust
  • Tapping ATTACK again after starting the animation will feint/cancel the swing
  • Attacks can be cancelled into alternate directions/attack types by inputting a second attack during the first move's windup
  • Hit the PARRY button to block incoming attacks
  • Parry stance must match incoming attack stance in order to block
  • Thrusts can be parried from either stance
  • Press ATTACK+PARRY to perform a super attack
  • Super attacks cannot be blocked
